name: NetBird+
description: Connect your devices into a single secure private WireGuard®-based mesh network with SSO/MFA and simple access controls.
short_desc: Zero-config WireGuard®-based mesh VPN with centralized access control.
author: NetBird

form_fields.label: Setup Key > Get this from your NetBird dashboard at app.netbird.io
Log Level > Set logging level (error, warn, info, debug, trace)
DNS Resolver Address > Override default DNS if needed
form_fields.placeholder: Leave empty to use system default (e.g. 1.1.1.1:53)
form_fields.hint: Leave empty for automatic DNS. Set to your host’s IP (e.g. 192.168.1.10:53) if using Pi-hole/AdGuard on the same machine.
